title: T206 93 card starter set ~ ALL RARE BACKS AB350 EPDG Sovereign OM ~ with HOF ~ $5000
author: t206kid

posts.post_title: T206 93 card starter set ~ ALL RARE BACKS AB350 EPDG Sovereign OM ~ with HOF ~ $5000
posts.post_content:
If anyone is thinking about starting an off back set...well here's your starter set.

Lot of 93 cards ~ ALL WITH RARE BACKS ~ 86 different cards (16.5% of the set!).

PRICE - $5000 FF or $5150 Goods

Condition: PR to VG. Average probably FR to GD. A small number of cards are real beaters but plenty of really clean nice cards as well. Backs generally present well, small number have back damage or staining.

Back breakdown - 93 cards total

1 American Beauty
1 EPDG
5 Old Mill
3 Polar Bear
21 Sovereign 150
41 Sovereign 350
9 Sovereign 350 Apple
11 Sovereign 460
1 Tolstoi

Hall of Famers: Home Run Baker Tolstoi, Fred Clarke portrait Sovereign 150, Clark Griffith portrait Sovereign 350, Clark Griffith batting Sovereign 350 apple

Full list of card and pictures here (the group pics are too big to upload): [url]https://www.ebay.com/itm/264762637444[/url]
